description:
Seiya manage to arrive safely in Jamiel, but finds Mu nowhere around. Even Kiki doesn’t know where he is. Kiki suddenly remembers Mu talking about the water of Life which flows from a spring at the summit of Jandara, a mountain nearby. Only the bravest of the brave are able to reach the summit. After countless hardships, Seiya manages to reach the spring.. When he returns with the Water, however, he finds Kiki being assaulted by the Silver Cloth Saint, Tarantula, Arakune. Without his Pegasus Cloth, Seiya is defenseless, but Steel Cloth Saint, Sky-Cloth, Sho arrives in the nick of time.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kesshikou! Hirake Dragon no Me yo
The Travel of Death! Dragon sees the Light Again
¡Prepárate para morir! Abre los ojos Dragón
決死行! 開けドラゴンの目よ
